actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the forfeiture of certain Federal retirement benefits for Federal employees convicted of making false statements before Congress, and for other purposes.
short_title: No Pensions for Lying Bureaucrats Act

summary.text:
No Pensions for Lying Bureaucrats Act

This bill bars federal employees who are convicted of making false statements while testifying before a congressional committee from receiving certain federal retirement benefits.
